author: Staff Reporter
text:
Power supply will be shut down in Kodambakkam area as part of emergency maintenance work in the Kodambakkam substation from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. on Saturday.

The areas to be affected by the shutdown includes Arcot Road, Kodambakkam; Duraisamy Road, United India Colony, Parangusapuram, Viswanathanpuram, Rangarajapuram, Railway Border Road, Circular Road, Bajanai Koil Street, Vanniar Street, Puliyur and Anand apartments, Sowrashtra Nagar, Zakaria Colony, Andavar Nagar, Palani Andavar Koil Street, Corporation Colony, Subraya Nagar, Kamaraj Colony, Palayakaran Street and parts of Ashok Nagar, Pookkaran Street, 21st Avenue, South Sivan Koil Street and Choolaimedu, according to a press release.
title: Power shutdown in Kodambakkam area
